task.title: Task: Renaming worksheet
task.shortdesc: Instructions on how to rename a worksheet.

context.p: t is recommended to give meaningful names to worksheets instead of the generated default names like Sheet1, Sheet2, Sheet3, ....

step.cmd: Rename a worksheet in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: Right click on the tab name of the worksheet and then choose Rename.
Double click on the tab name of the worksheet.

step.stepresult: In both cases the name will be selected.

step.cmd: Type the new name, closing with Enter.
